snippet: Andy Pettitte fell to 7-9 on the season after allowing 7 runs and 11 hits in two and two-thirds innings of an 8-1 loss in Chicago.
lead_paragraph: Andy Pettitte fell to 7-9 on the season after allowing 7 runs and 11 hits in two and two-thirds innings of an 8-1 loss in Chicago.

headline.main: Pettitte, in Shortest Outing of Season, Is Knocked Around by White Sox
headline.print_headline: Pettitte, in Shortest Outing of Season, Is Knocked Around by White Sox
